languages.text: Сестра Арджента не скрывала огромного уважения и благодарности, которые испытывала к Лорд-капитану. И все же долг заставил сестру покинуть свиту фон Валанциус. С благословения Экклезиархии она основала малый Орден сестер Сороритас — Орден Единственной звезды. Сплотившись вокруг хранительницы святой реликвии, его сестры защищали верных от опасностей, что еще таил Простор. Очень быстро Орден и его отважная основательница стали героями легенд, даря надежду и вдохновение всем верным детям Терры.

Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.
languages.original_text: Сестра Арджента не скрывала огромного уважения и благодарности, которые испытывала к Лорд-капитану. И все же долг заставил сестру покинуть свиту фон Валанциус. С благословения Экклезиархии она основала малый Орден сестер Сороритас — Орден Единственной звезды. Сплотившись вокруг хранительницы святой реликвии, его сестры защищали верных от опасностей, что еще таил Простор. Очень быстро Орден и его отважная основательница стали героями легенд, даря надежду и вдохновение всем верным детям Терры.

traits.locale_text: Sister Argenta did not hide the great respect and gratitude she felt towards the Lord Captain. Yet her duty compelled her to leave the retinue of von Valancius. With the blessing of Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of Adepta Sororitas: an Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of a sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from dangers that were hidden around the Expanse. Soon, the Order and its courageous founder became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration into the hearts of all faithful children on Terra.

languages.text: 阿洁塔修女毫不掩饰她对领主舰长的敬意和感激之情。然而，由于职责所在，她不得不离开冯·瓦兰修斯的队伍。在国教的祝福下，她成立了一个小型修女会——命运之星修会。修会的姐妹们团结在神圣遗物的守护者身边，保护忠实信徒免受扩区中潜在危险的伤害。很快，命运之星修会和它勇敢的创始人就成为了传说中的英雄，在泰拉忠实的子民心中灌输了希望与灵感。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: 阿洁塔修女毫不掩饰她对领主舰长的敬意和感激之情。然而，由于职责所在，她不得不离开冯·瓦兰修斯的队伍。在国教的祝福下，她成立了一个小型修女会——命运之星修会。修会的姐妹们团结在神圣遗物的守护者身边，保护忠实信徒免受扩区中潜在危险的伤害。很快，命运之星修会和它勇敢的创始人就成为了传说中的英雄，在泰拉忠实的子民心中灌输了希望与灵感。

languages.text: Schwester Argenta machte kein Geheimnis aus dem tiefen Respekt und der Dankbarkeit, die sie dem Lord Captain gegenüber empfand. Die Pflicht zwang sie aber, das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu verlassen. Mit dem Segen der Ekklesiarchie gründete sie einen kleinen Orden der Adepta Sororitas: den Orden des Einen Sterns. Die Schwestern des Ordens versammelten sich um die Hüterin eines heiligen Relikts und beschützten die Gläubigen vor den Gefahren, die noch immer in der Ausdehnung lauerten. Schnell wurden der Orden insgesamt und seine mutige Gründerin zu legendären Heldinnen, die den gläubigen Kindern Terras Hoffnung schenkten und sie inspirierten, ihnen nachzueifern.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: Schwester Argenta verbarg den großen Respekt und die Dankbarkeit nicht, die sie dem Lord Captain gegenüber empfand. Die Pflicht zwang sie aber, das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu verlassen. Mit dem Segen der Ekklesiarchie gründete sie einen kleinen Orden der Adepta Sororitas: den Orden des Einen Sterns. Die Schwestern des Ordens versammelten sich um die Hüterin eines heiligen Relikts und beschützten die Gläubigen vor den Gefahren, die noch immer in der Ausdehnung lauerten. Bald wurden der Orden und seine mutige Gründerin zu legendären Heldinnen, die den gläubigen Kindern Terras Hoffnung schenkten und sie inspirierten, ihnen nachzueifern.

languages.text: Sœur Argenta ne cachait pas l'immense respect et la gratitude qu'elle éprouvait envers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, mais le devoir l'obligea à quitter son entourage. Avec la bénédiction de l'Ecclésiarchie, elle fonda un corps mineur de l'Adepta Sororitas : l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique. Rassemblées autour de la gardienne de la relique sacrée, ces sœurs protégeaient les fidèles des dangers qui rôdaient encore dans les Étendues. L'Ordre et sa courageuse fondatrice devinrent rapidement des héroïnes de légende qui inspiraient espoir et courage aux fidèles enfants de Terra.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: Sœur Argenta ne cachait pas l'immense respect et la gratitude qu'elle éprouvait envers {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, mais le devoir l'obligea à quitter son entourage. Avec la bénédiction de l'Ecclésiarchie, elle fonda un corps mineur de l'Adepta Sororitas : l'Ordre de l'Étoile unique. Rassemblées autour de la gardienne de la relique sacrée, ces sœurs protégeaient les fidèles des dangers qui planaient encore sur les Étendues. Bientôt, l'Ordre et sa courageuse fondatrice devinrent des héroïnes de légende qui inspiraient espoir et courage dans le cœur des fidèles enfants de Terra.

languages.text: La hermana Argenta no ocultó el gran respeto y gratitud que sentía hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Aun así, el deber la obligó a abandonar el séquito de von Valancius. Con la venia de la Eclesiarquía, fundó una pequeña Orden del Adepta Sororitas: la Orden de la Estrella Única. Unidas en torno a la guardiana de la reliquia sagrada, sus Hermanas protegen a los fieles de los peligros que aún acechan en la Extensión. La Orden y su valerosa fundadora no tardaron en convertirse en heroínas de leyenda que despertaban ilusión y esperanza en los corazones de los niños devotos de Terra.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: La hermana Argenta no ocultó el gran respeto y gratitud que sentía hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Aun así, el deber la obligó a abandonar el séquito de von Valancius. Con la venia de la Eclesiarquía, fundó una pequeña Orden del Adepta Sororitas: la Orden de la Estrella Única. Unidas en torno a la guardiana de la reliquia sagrada, sus Hermanas protegen a los fieles de los peligros que aún acechan en la Extensión. La Orden y su valerosa fundadora no tardaron en convertirse en heroínas de leyenda que despertaban ilusión y esperanza en los corazones de los niños devotos de Terra.

languages.text: シスター・アルジェンタはロード・キャプテンに対する尊敬と感謝の念を隠すことはなかった。しかし義務により、彼女はフォン・ヴァランシウスの従者を離れることを余儀なくされた。帝国聖教会の祝福を受け、彼女は修道聖女会の小教団である一つ星教団を設立した。神聖な遺物を守るために団結したシスターたちは、エクスパンスに潜む危険から信者たちを守った。やがて大騎士団とその勇敢な創設者は伝説の英雄となり、地球の信仰深い子供たちの心に希望とインスピレーションを植え付けた。
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: シスター・アルジェンタはロード・キャプテンに対する尊敬と感謝の念を隠すことはなかった。しかし義務により、彼女はフォン・ヴァランシウスの従者を離れることを余儀なくされた。帝国聖教会の祝福を受け、彼女は修道聖女会の小教団である一つ星教団を設立した。神聖な遺物を守るために団結したシスターたちは、エクスパンスに潜む危険から信者たちを守った。やがて大騎士団とその勇敢な創設者は伝説の英雄となり、地球の信仰深い子供たちの心に希望とインスピレーションを植え付けた。

languages.text: Rahibe Argenta, Lord Kaptan'a duyduğu saygıyı ve minneti hiçbir zaman gizlemedi. Ne yazık ki görevi onu von Valancius'un maiyetinden ayrılmak durumunda bıraktı. Ekleşiarşi'nin desteğiyle Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı adında, küçük bir Adepta Sororitas Tarikatı kurdu. Kutsal yadigârı elinde bulunduranın etrafında birleşen Rahibeler, inananları hâlâ Enginlik'te kol gezen tehlikelere karşı korudu. Genişleyen Tarikat ve onun cesur kurucusu; kısa süre içinde efsanevi kahramanlara dönüştü, Terra'nın inançlı çocuklarının yüreğine umut ve esin aşıladılar.
languages.original_text: Sister Argenta made no secret of the great respect and gratitude she felt toward the Lord Captain. Yet duty compelled her to leave von Valancius's retinue. With the blessing of the Ecclesiarchy, she founded a minor Order of the Adepta Sororitas: the Order of the One Star. United around the keeper of the sacred relic, its Sisters protected the faithful from the dangers still lurking in the Expanse. The wider Order and its courageous founder very quickly became heroes of legend, instilling hope and inspiration in the hearts of Terra's faithful children.

traits.locale_text: Rahibe Argenta, Lord Kaptan'a karşı duyduğu saygıyı ve minneti hiçbir zaman gizlemedi ancak görevi onu von Valancius'un maiyetinden ayrılmak durumunda bıraktı. Ekleşiarşi'nin desteğiyle küçük bir Adepta Sororitas Tarikatı kurdu: Emsalsiz Yıldız Tarikatı. Kutsal yadigârı elinde bulunduran kişinin etrafında birleşen Rahibeler, inananları hâlâ Enginlik'te kol gezen tehlikelere karşı korudu. Genişleyen Tarikat ve onun cesur kurucusu, kısa süre içinde efsanevi kahramanlara dönüştüler ve Terra'nın inançlı çocuklarının yüreği için umut ve ilham kaynağı oldular.
